page.description: Create a new form instance. The form type is specified by the *[formId]*. The account is the account associated with the API key.

argument.name: formId
argument.description: formId of the form definition for which a new formInstance will be created

argument.name: formDataJSON
argument.description: JSON data for the the new formInstance

argument.name: person
argument.description: the userId for the TransForm user to whom the new formInstnce is assigned.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: recordsAdded
property.type: number of rows added to the forms table

property.name: forminstanceid
property.description: forminstanceid (i.e. primary key) of the new form instance

section.title: Node
Xbasic
